name: Dormant Utility Service Technician demo
description:
Dormant Utility Service Technician is a run/jump/climb non-combat, sci fi, funky 2D platformer casualvania where you control a recently cryo-awakened galactic utility technician.

This demo serves as the prequel to the EPIC story that is featured in the full version.  The controls for this demo are at the bottom of this post (controller and keyboard supported)

There are two modes in this demo (VR and regular).  You start in "VR" mode, which features more platform-oriented gameplay.  Pressing /(escape) should exit the "VR" mode, to the regular mode, where you walk around and interact with things, get a cutscene and it's over.   VR mode has a little fanfare scene for completing the puzzle, but is not requirement for the storyline in regular mode.  *VR mode is not a feature of the main game, where the platforming is more objective/exploration-based

Comments/Questions/feedback are welcome.

All assets for this game are home-made by me, Mike B10, an independent solo developer in Portland, OR .   For more info follow the devlog here and @dormantutility on social media.

Controller recommended  but not necessary  (hold L or R trigger for in-game controls)

(keyboard controls) :  

A = glide/interact,   S = jump,   D = climb,  Escape = start,  Arrows = move,  Q = back
